title: Dream big. Live well!
app_fee: $55 per person, $65 for couple ( in money order )
posting_body: ['Fountain Park Apartments', '12525 S Kirkwood Rd.', 'Stafford, TX 77477', '$885/month', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Year Built: 1970', 'Square Footage: 5750 sqft.', 'Bedrooms: 1 Bed', 'Bathrooms: 1 Bath', 'Lease Duration: 1 Year', 'Deposit: $500', 'Pets Policy: Cat and Dog friendly', 'Laundry: Shared', 'Parking: Guest parking', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'DESCRIPTION', 'The beautiful grounds of Fountain Park Apartment Homes feature lush landscaping, a professionally designed playground, soccer field, calming waterscapes and fountains, a picnic area with BBQ grills, jogging trail, perimeter fence, reserved parking, school bus pick up, and 24-hour emergency maintenance.', 'We also have monthly events for our residents and host a Resident Activity Center.', 'The apartment homes have a variety of one, two and three bedroom floor plans and amenities to fit even the most selective resident.', 'Large open living and dining areas, French doors, ceiling fans in dining room and the bedroom, walk in closets and outside storage along with a fully equipped kitchen.', 'We look forward to assisting you with selecting your new home.', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Living room', 'Dining room', 'Walk-in closet', 'Master bath', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher', 'Garbage disposal', 'Garden', 'Air conditioning', 'Ceiling fans', 'Cable-ready', 'Wired', 'Hardwood floor', 'Wet bar', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES', 'Gated entry', 'Shared pool', 'Fitness center', 'Playground', 'Business center', 'Guest parking', 'Covered parking']
